alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 22 at 10:32AM MDT until June 23 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...El Paso county. * WHEN...From 3 PM MDT this afternoon through this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Thunderstorms are possible once again late this afternoon and evening. Given the saturated grounds across El Paso county, it will not take much rain to cause flash flooding across the region. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
